title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to log into their account despite correct credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Payment gateway declined transaction though card is valid.

title: Bug in Mobile App
description: App crashes when navigating to profile page.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer requested dark mode feature for better usability.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Reset password link expired immediately after receiving.

title: Order Not Delivered
description: Customer claims order not delivered even after marked as delivered.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: Emails about new updates are received hours later.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer requesting refund due to wrong product shipment.

title: Broken Link on Website
description: Checkout page link redirects to 404 error.

title: Slow Performance
description: Website takes too long to load product images.
